participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: hardworking and practical, enjoys outdoor life and family-oriented activities.
participant_1.background: i work my parents farms. i drive a big truck and live in country. i have a pet cow. i am an electrician.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: cheerful and imaginative, loves to explore and express herself through music.
participant_2.background: i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i love to go to disney world every year. i'm in the third grade.

content.text: i'm doing well. how about yourself?
i am all right, just finished frozen
what do you do for a living? i work as a electrician.
i play with my friends and visit Disney world
do you like disney? i live in texas.
